data.title: Continuing drought prompts readoption of emergency curtailment regulation in Russian River
data.excerpt: The State Water Resources Control Board today readopted an emergency regulation authorizing the Division of Water Rights to curtail diversions in Sonoma and Mendocino counties to protect threatened drinking water supplies and migrating fish in the Russian River.
data.author: Kalin Kipling
